context: Hi there, what kind of movies are you looking to see?
Do you know of any interesting documentaries?
Yes, have you seen Food, Inc. (2008) ? That one was a real eye opener to the food and farming industry
I haven't seen it. Is it like Super Size Me (2004) or more like Cowspiracy (2014) ?
I loved Super Size Me, and it's a little like that but with more focus on farming and the evil Monsanto company.
Have you seen Making a Murderer on Netflix? That was a crazy series
Yep. Loved it. Love crime documentaries.
So good. I love a good documentary, how about a political one? Fahrenheit 9/11 (2004) was very intense.
resp: No problem, I think you'll have to check out Food, Inc. (2008) . Enjoy! Have a great day.

I love inspiring and informative biography movies, emotional and thought-provoking dramas, and informative and enlightening history movies. Do you have any recommendations for me?

context.content: Have you seen Hidden Figures (2016)?
I haven't seen Hidden Figures (2016). Can you tell me more about it?
context.feelings: I'm excited to discover new stories and experience new cinematic narratives. Hidden Figures sounds interesting, but I need more details to see if it matches my preferences.

context.content: It's about the African-American women who became the first female astronaut to orbit successfully. It's really inspiring.
That sounds fascinating! Can you tell me more about the storyline and the emotional depth of the movie?

context.content: I really enjoyed Hidden Figures 2 (2016). It's a really good movie. It has a lot of great characters and great story lines.

Can you tell me more about the storyline and character development in Hidden Figures (2016)? I want to make sure it covers the inspiring biography, emotional drama, and enlightening history that I'm looking for.
